summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2349 for the improvement of Woodland Park Avenue, from West Green Lake Boulevard to North Eighty-fifth Street, all in The City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 24355, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
